object.creator: 开发者
object.name: vIB_TY_ZZBDGYJ_XSB
object.describe: 纸质版底稿移交(新三板)

column.name: BJDBR
column.describe: 签字人(保荐代表人/主办人)

column.name: ZDYJRLXFS
column.describe: 部门指定移交人联系方式

column.name: CKNHLC
column.expression: <%@ livebos language='javascript' %> var i =ABS_SQLVALUE("select instid from ecif.lcIB_NHSP t where t.XMMC =? and exists (select 1 from jgcrm.OS_WFENTRY f where t.instid =f.id and state <>3)",[XMMC_ID]); var url='/UIProcessor?Creator=workflow&Table=wfIB_NHSP&WorkID='+i+'&HideCancelBtn=true&extWindow=true&PopupWin=false&NewWindow=false'; '内核审批流程'

column.name: CKGSNHLC
column.expression: <%@ livebos language='javascript' %> var i =ABS_SQLVALUE("select instid from ecif.lcIB_GS_NHLC t where t.XMMC =? and exists (select 1 from jgcrm.OS_WFENTRY f where t.instid =f.id and state <>3)",[XMMC_ID]); var url='/UIProcessor?Creator=workflow&Table=wfIB_GS_NHLC&WorkID='+i+'&HideCancelBtn=true&extWindow=true&PopupWin=false&NewWindow=false'; '内核审批流程'

column.name: CKSBGPNHLC
column.describe: 查看三板挂牌内核流程
column.expression: <%@ livebos language='javascript' %> var i =ABS_SQLVALUE("select instid from ecif.lcIB_NHLCB t where t.XMMC =? and exists (select 1 from jgcrm.OS_WFENTRY f where t.instid =f.id and state <>3)",[XMMC_ID]); var url='/UIProcessor?Creator=workflow&Table=wfIB_NHSPLC&WorkID='+i+'&HideCancelBtn=true&extWindow=true&PopupWin=false&NewWindow=false'; '内核审批流程'

column.name: CKSBZRZBGCZNHLC
column.describe: 查看三板再融资并购重组内核流程
column.expression: <%@ livebos language='javascript' %> var i =ABS_SQLVALUE("select instid from ecif.lcIB_NHLCB_DZBGCZ t where t.XMMC =? and exists (select 1 from jgcrm.OS_WFENTRY f where t.instid =f.id and state <>3)",[XMMC_ID]); var url='/UIProcessor?Creator=workflow&Table=wfIB_NHSPLC_DZBGCZ&WorkID='+i+'&HideCancelBtn=true&extWindow=true&PopupWin=false&NewWindow=false'; '内核审批流程'

column.name: JGTS
column.expression:
<%@ livebos language='javascript' %> '
客户单位是否持有“武器装备科研生产保密资格证书”、“武器装备科研生产许可证书”、“武器装备质量管理体系证书”、“装备承制单位资格证书”四证之一'

column.name: DGCS
column.describe: 初次移交底稿册数/箱数
